item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Phased Array Microphone (2023) (140 points | 43 comments)

3. Understanding Google's Quantum Error Correction Breakthrough (16 points | 3 comments)

5. The Deceptively Asymmetric Unit Sphere (41 points | 8 comments)
6. Amazon to invest another $4B in Anthropic, OpenAI's biggest rival (206 points | 96 comments)
7. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (102 points | 35 comments)
8. Salmon return to lay eggs in historic habitat after dam removal project (221 points | 146 comments)
9. FaSTer: Atari ST Digital Magazine (64 points | 15 comments)
10. Wasp (YC W21) is hiring a framework engineer to build Laravel for JavaScript ( | hide)
11. From string to AST: parsing (2019) (72 points | 15 comments)
12. Rendering "modern" Winamp skins in the browser (6 points | discuss)
13. Prince Nico Mbarga’s biggest hit outsold any of The Beatles’ (2017) (39 points | 36 comments)
14. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (498 points | 71 comments)
15. A “meta-optics” camera that is the size of a grain of salt (171 points | 107 comments)

20. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (371 points | 332 comments)
21. Bayesian Neural Networks (215 points | 37 comments)
22. What's Next for WebGPU (167 points | 155 comments)
23. NeuralDEM – Real-Time Simulation of Industrial Particulate Flows (46 points | 9 comments)
24. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (214 points | 57 comments)
25. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (103 points | 72 comments)
26. Show HN: OnePageGA – Simple dashboard for GA4 like Plausible (20 points | 18 comments)
27. The meme-ification of the “Demon Core” (353 points | 259 comments)
28. The Surprising Social Lives of Pythons (8 points | 4 comments)
29. Machiavelli and the Emergence of the Private Study (91 points | 24 comments)
